unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for infusing fresh talent. IIM Ahmedabad consistently provides high-caliber candidates. Our recruitment team will be visiting IIT Delhi next month. We should target pre-placement talks by Nov 15th. Like in "3 Idiots," we aim to find individuals with both academic excellence and practical skills. Remuneration packages start at Rs. 10 lakhs per annum. We also offer relocation assistance up to 50 km. Focus on candidates with strong communication skills, especially in Hindi and English.

We should target pre-placement talks by November fifteenth. Like in "three Idiots," we aim to find individuals with both academic excellence and practical skills. Remuneration packages start at rupees ten lakhs per annum. We also offer relocation assistance up to fifty kilometer. Focus on candidates with strong communication skills, especially in Hindi and English.
